mapper.insert: insert into article (articleid, articletype, articlestatus, content, createtime, lastmodifytime,authorid,replyto,rootid) values(#{articleid}, #{articletype}, #{articlestatus}, #{content}, now(),now(),#{authorid},#{replyto},#{rootid})
